Posts.EditableText:
As already mentioned [url=http://www.axeuk.com/phpBB3/viewtopic.php?f=6&t=2017#p16512:32hism1v]here[/url:32hism1v], but now in it's own thread:

[code:32hism1v]define game <SomeGame>

    ambiguous {

        'process AmbiguousItems array here
        $disambiguate(AmbiguousItems)$
    }

end define[/code:32hism1v]

The above is meant to show:

[list:32hism1v]* a new script hook for disambiguation
* a new built-in array of disambiguation items
* a new built-in function that allows one to call the disambiguation popup[/list:u:32hism1v]
Posts.HTML:
As already mentioned here, but now in it's own thread:

define game <SomeGame>

    ambiguous {

        'process AmbiguousItems array here
        $disambiguate(AmbiguousItems)$
    }

end define


The above is meant to show:

[list]* a new script hook for disambiguation
* a new built-in array of disambiguation items
* a new built-in function that allows one to call the disambiguation popup[/list:u]

Posts.EditableText: Sounds good to me (means I can rework the disambiguation if I want to and not even bother with the default).
Posts.HTML: Sounds good to me (means I can rework the disambiguation if I want to and not even bother with the default).

Posts.EditableText: Exactly. Also, we can then decide if it makes more sense to eat a red apple than a red bike!
Posts.HTML:
Exactly.
